TextBlock.Text: "Research Log - Cycle 8183: We don't have much time - a mere <Color=#ff0040>(</Color>ew hundred cycles at most. Archivist is busy collating data for Explorer's "<Color=orange>Astral Codec</Color>" idea. It's good that he has somet<Color=#ff0040>)</Color>ing to do. Our discovery impacted him the hardest of us."
